mixdb

Class TheoSpectrumGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • mixdb.TheoSpectrumGenerator

  • public class TheoSpectrumGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that takes in a peptide database, it generate theoretical spectrum for the peptides candidates, to be efficient it store a subsset of the theoretical spectrum in memory, so it won't need to re-create the theo-spectrum repeatedly
    Author:
    Jian Wang

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      java.util.Collection<Spectrum> getCandidates(Spectrum s, double windowWidth, double precursorMass, double tolerance, int charge)
      This version of the method handle querying multiple precursors with same spectrum the windowWidth tells how wide the isolation window for selecting precursors for fragmentation for ms/ms
      java.util.Collection<Spectrum> getCandidates(Spectrum s, double parentMassTolerance, java.util.List<PTM[]> ptmList)
      This version of the method added support for PTM, let's turn off caching of theoretical spectrum for now
